review: Didn't realize I can't broadcast most of videos I stream on my smart phone, eg. Amazon instant video and other apps.  Very limited apps I can broadcast.  The ones I can cast, eg Pandora, is problematic (may be because the apps sux).  YouTube plays just fine.Streaming from my laptop most TV program from major networks had mostly been annoyingly slow and unreliable.  Quality is poor may be when connecting to my Wifi (router is only in the next room).Overall though, for $35, I guess I won't have much expectation.  Just okay.  I'd use my traditional HDMI cable to my laptop which gives me much better quality.
